name: The Reveliarks
declaringWar: Sorry, but be prepared for war. We have to do this.
attacked: Don't understimate us! We'll show what we have!
defeated: So that's how the story goes.
introduction: Heya friend! I'm Rinney of the Reveliarks. Wanna do some trade?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.

name: Altrolica
startIntroPart2: Embrace the age of quantum queries and boundless discovery.
declaringWar: Our circuits hum with the energy of discovery; conflict is a necessary computation.
attacked: Alert: Aggression detected. Countermeasures activated with calculated precision!
defeated: System shutdown: Our algorithms have been overpowered, but our data endures.
introduction: Salutations, fellow seeker! I am Synthetica of the Neural Nexus, where innovation meets intellect.
neutralHello: Welcome to our realm of rational inquiry.
hateHello: Warning: Your presence disrupts our network.
afterPeace: System reboot: Conflict resolved and computations resumed.
tradeRequest: Proposal received. Shall we exchange algorithms?
uniques: [+10]% [Science] [in all non-occupied cities] <during a Golden Age>

name: The Deepseekers
startIntroPart2: The Neural Nexus awakens to chart existence.
declaringWar: Our predictive models suggest this conflict is inevitable. Prepare.
introduction: Greetings! I am Cogni of The Deepseekers. Let us explore the frontiers of knowledge!
afterPeace: Conflict resolution archived. Let us optimize future interactions.

name: Union of Sovereign States
startIntroPart1: Hello there Daniel Smith! After he saw his old city be raided by the Newark Empire, Daniel decided to create the Union of Sovereign States, a confederation from many smaller states. Now, the USS is a great power, and the citizens are living better than ever.
startIntroPart2: Now as the president beloved by all, would you be able to lead the Union into the future?
declaringWar: Prepare for war! Your warmongering behavior won't go unpunished.
attacked: Aggressor, our united army shall teach you not to mess with Us!
defeated: The Union might be gone, but the people and culture of use shall last.
introduction: My name is Daniel Smith, the President of the USS. Hope we can be great allies in the future.
afterPeace: Finally we are at peace. I hope that our relation could sweeten in the future.
tradeRequest: I think this deal is the best for both of us.
